title: "Resend room invitations"

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Resend room invitations"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/2.0/files/rooms/{id}/resend"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Resends the email invitations to a room with the ID specified in the request to the selected users.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","description":"Room Id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":9846}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"User invitation","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"usersIds":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"List of user IDs","nullable":true,"example":["75a5f745-f697-4418-b38d-0fe0d277e258"]},"resendAll":{"type":"boolean","description":"Resend all","example":true}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"User invitation parameters","title":"ASC.Files.Core.ApiModels.RequestDto.UserInvitation"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
